profile.name: Hadi Noori
profile.bio_p1: Specializing in the intersection of algorithmic accountability and institutional policy. My work focuses on constructing robust governance frameworks for high-stakes AI deployment, ensuring compliance with emerging global standards while mitigating systemic risks.
profile.bio_p2: With a background in Information Systems Management (DBA) and hands-on experience in digital transformation failures, I operate as a strategic advisor to organizations navigating the 'Black Box' problem of generative AI.

credentials.meta: Information Systems Management | Focus on Digital Transformation Failures

col1_items: AI Risk Assessment Frameworks (NIST/EU AI Act)
